description: Numbers n such that n and n+1 are modest (cf. A054986).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..250
example: 2036 is modest because Mod[2036, 36] = 20. 2037 is modest because Mod[2037, 037] = 2. Hence 2036 is this pair's modest twin representative.
